text: usane aakaash se paanee utaara to nadee-naale apanee-apanee samaee ke anusaar bah nikale. phir paanee ke bahaav ne ubhare hue jhaag ko utha liya aur usamen se bhee, jise ve zevar ya doosare saamaan banaane ke lie aag mein tapaate hain, aisa hee jhaag uthata hai. is prakaar allaah saty aur asaty kee misaal bayaan karata hai. phir jo jhaag hai vah to sookhakar nasht ho jaata hai aur jo kuchh logon ko laabh pahunchaanevaala hota hai, vah dharatee mein thahar jaata hai. isee prakaar allaah drshtaant prastut karata hai
